docs.title: OpenSEM
docs.text: OpenSEM is a light-weight framework for creating Small Expert Models. It provides simple commands to initialize workspaces, create projects, add data, and manage configurations.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Initialize SEM workspace
  • Create new SEM projects
  • Add data files to projects
  • Manage project configurations and models
  • Delete projects safely

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Python 3.7+
  • (Optional) Create a virtual environment: bash python3 -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate
  • Install dependencies: bash pip install -r requirements.txt

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: All commands are run from the project root using the CLI entry point opensem.py:
